VVDS Survey¶

This class is dedicated to handling observations from VVDS galaxy redshift survey, see LeFevre et al. 2013.

http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2013A%26A...559A..14L

class GalaxySurveyVVDS.GalaxySurveyVVDS[source]¶

The class GalaxySurveyVVDS is dedicated to handling VVDS survey.

class GalaxySurveyVVDS.GalaxySurveyVVDS(redshift_catalog='VVDS_WIDE_summary.fits')[source]
Loads the environement proper to the VVDS survey :
  • Defines all the proper paths in the database,
  • Opens the catalog,
Parameters:redshift_catalog – name of the VVDS redshift catalog (path to the fits file)
computeLineLuminosity(line, distanceCorrection)[source]¶

computes the line luminosities for the line list given. :param catalog: fits catalog containing redshift, EBV and line fluxes :param line:
